title: The Economy Still Has the Virus
description:
Republicans have begun embracing masks. It’s a welcome change -- but it’s also an economic indicator. 
Guest: Slate’s Jordan Weissmann. 
Slate Plus members get bonus segments and ad-free podcast feeds. Sign up now.

itunes:subtitle: The Trump administration wants to control the economy without controlling its disease.
